sentences.en: A large extinct ground sloth of the family Megatheriidae of the Miocene Epoch through the Epoch.
sentences.cn: 大懒兽中新世至更新世时期大懒兽科之栖于地面的已绝迹的大树懒.

sentences.en: Great Barrier Reef was formed in the Miocene period, 2500 years have elapsed since the historical.
sentences.cn: 大堡礁形成于中新世时期, 距今已有2500万年的历史.

sentences.en: Miocene formations ( better: strata ) are well - exposed in this area.
sentences.cn: 本区具有出露良好的中新世地层.

sentences.en: Miocene mammalian footprints have been recently identified from several Late Miocene localities in Iran.
sentences.cn: 伊朗晚中新世的几个地点新近发现了哺乳动物足迹化石.

sentences.en: One of the most noticeable features of the Middle Miocene rock layers was their periodicity.
sentences.cn: 中新世中期的岩层,最显著的特徵之一,就是这些岩石所呈现的周期性.

sentences.en: There are four hydrocarbon source rocks, Palaeocene, Eocene, Oligocene and Miocene.
sentences.cn: 西湖凹陷发育古新统 、 始新统 、 渐新统及中新统四大烃源岩系.
